passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
passes.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

ancestry: html > body > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(1) > h1
html > body > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(4) > form > h4:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(4) > form > h4:nth-child(6)
html > body > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(4) > form > h4:nth-child(9)
html > body > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(4) > form > div:nth-child(13) > div:nth-child(2) > iframe:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(2) > footer:nth-child(3) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > h4:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(2) > footer:nth-child(3) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > h4:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(2) > footer:nth-child(3) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(3) > h4:nth-child(1)

any.message: Heading order valid
